forum.content:
Hello everyone, it is nice to meet you all. I have an English question about sentence structure. I will appreciate if there is anyone explaning this sentence. Thanks in advanced.

"My own father had a form of Parkinson's disease and suffered from depression I would say about 10 years prior to our being clear about exactly what was going on with him"

it is translated as "我自己的父親罹患了一種形式的帕金森氏症，而且我敢說他在我們確知他究竟是怎麼一回事的十年前就罹患了憂鬱症"

I dont understand the structure after the ”I would say......” Could anyone explain this for me?

thanks.
forum.title: Sentence Structure
